column3: Although QLD is not allocated a cumulative generation allocation, 628 MW of capacity has been awarded under Tender 1
Represents 1044 MW awarded in Tender 1, and the maximum cap of 750 MW allowed under Tender 4.
Represents 600 MW of capacity awarded in Tender 1, 650 MW under Tender 4, and the remainder of capacity to reach the cumulative generation allocation for Victoria of 5 GW (both wind and solar)
